validation.firstname_alpha_dash: First name can only contain letters, numbers, dashes, and underscores.
validation.firstname_min: First name must be at least 2 characters.

two_factor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
two_factor.description: Enable two-factor authentication to add an extra layer of security to your account.
two_factor.enabled_message: Two-factor authentication is currently enabled for your account.
two_factor.disable_confirm_text: Are you sure you want to disable 2FA? This will make your account less secure.
two_factor.confirm_password_prompt: Please confirm your password to continue:

verify.title: Verify Email
verify.success_message: Your email address has been successfully verified. You will be redirected to your account shortly.
verify.error_help: The verification link may have expired or is invalid. Please try requesting a new verification email.
verify.no_params_message: Please click the verification link in your email to verify your account.
verify.resend_message: Didn't receive the verification email? We can send you another one.
verify.resend_success: Verification email sent! Please check your inbox.
verify.check_email_message: We've sent a verification link to your email address. Please click the link to verify your account.
